Uses of Class
org.securecryptoconfig.SCCSignature

      static SCCSignature SCCSignature.createFromExistingSignature​(byte[] existingSCCSignature)
      Return SCCSignature from byte[] representation of a existing SCCSignature
      static SCCSignature SCCSignature.createFromExistingSignature​(java.lang.String existingSCCSignature)
      Return SCCSignature from String (Base64) representation of a existing SCCSignature
      SCCSignature PlaintextContainer.sign​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key)
      Signing with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
      SCCSignature SecureCryptoConfig.sign​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key, byte[] plaintext)
      Signing with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.

      Signing with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
      SCCSignature SCCSignature.updateSignature​(org.securecryptoconfig.PlaintextContainerInterface plaintext, org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key)
      Update signature possibly using a different algorithm/parameters.
      SCCSignature SecureCryptoConfig.updateSignature​(org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCKey key, byte[] plaintext)
      Update the exsting SCCSignature of a plaintext with a new signature based on the current Secure Crypto Config.
